> <OLD>
>
>
> Hdyras jumped towards Megastorm and opened fire in the spot where the spark
> must be after tyhat his multiple heads headed there and starated to attack
> at the same spot

<NEW>

As MEGASTORM was still in tank mode, getting to his spark chamber
would be next to impossible. His armor was extremely tough and
durable!

However the attacks from HYDRAS blew him backward skidding along the floor!

Around them the room continued to shake as the room destabilized.
Parts of the ceiling began to fall in as the floor itself began to
crack. Holes were opening in the floor and the walls were beginning to
come apart.

A hole opened up beneath MEGASTORM and sent him tumbling down into darkness.

"NOOOOOOOOOOoooooooooooooo!!" He yelled as he disappeared from view!

The room continued to shake violently. HELLSCREAM and the others had
already left the room!

(TAG)

- Preston
